actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To direct the Consumer Product Safety Commission to strengthen regulations concerning the flammability of children's clothing.

summary.text: Requires the Consumer Product Safety Commission to: (1) revise certain regulations relating to the flammability of children's sleepwear; and (2) strengthen substantially the standards for tests used to determine the flammability of such clothing to ensure that such standards are grounded on a firm scientific basis.

titles.title: To direct the Consumer Product Safety Commission to strengthen regulations concerning the flammability of children's clothing.
